resources.string: Just A Concept Game, CC BY-NC, 2013

Heat the paper with a touch to reveal its hidden story.
   Be careful though - too long a touch will scorch the paper and the message within.
   Only after you uncover the whole message you will be allowed to continue with the story.
   Light and vibration will tell you how hot your touch is. Beware though, even a bit of heat on already burned area may start the flame. 
 
 Sounds:
   Night of Chaos, Kevin MacLeod
   Burning-Room, suonho
   Bell Rise 4, DJ Chronos
 
   Note: Volume is controlled by your device. If the sound is on but you do not hear anything (in game, there is no menu music), try increasing the volume by appropriate button.
